name: A Second Person Game (Prototype)
description:
A prototype for the experiment about A Second person perspective game.

This is the game where you have 8 different levels. You will be faced with some enemies, and a Player (Protagonist).

Gameplay: The player will have a sword as a weapon. Same for the enemies. WASD to move around. Swing sword with Left mouse click to attack an enemy!

The camera will seem a bit weird for the first time as it is a second-person camera, by which, you will see the player through the enemy's eyes.

Watch this video to understand the concept in a better way!
